post.text: Trump University was a vehicle for Donald J. Trump to exploit vulnerable Americans for his own gain.

comment.author: Andrew
comment.text: Trump voters are the dumbest. The same that voted for Sierra W. Bush twice and almost ruined the country with two wars and the biggest depression since the 1930s. Mollye to deport these Confederate holdovers.

replies.author: Jessee
replies.text: Brad Can you please tell us how many wars Obama got America into and please name them ?

replies.author: Katherine
replies.text: Hillary voted for the war and called it a "business opportunity" You're a moron.

replies.author: Eli
replies.text: Brad Boynton All Obama has tried to do is clean up the God awful mess that Sierra Dubya Bush left in the Middle East.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: It is called SALES 101. Any person with HALF a brain can figure this out and every school.. company has a play book to bring in money.
